greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-n)^(n-k) * binomial(2*k,k) * binomial(2*n,2*k).
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[If[n == 0, Boole[n == k], (-n)^(n - k)] * Binomial[2*k, k] * Binomial[2*n, 2*k], {k, 0, n}]; Array[a, 20, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Aug 27 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Aug 27 2020
